attributes.action: Be true to his word of being brought up to treat everyone as equals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To give the people in ENGLAND the same rights as his constituents in SCOTLAND.
ie: Free Prescriptions, Access to All the PRESCRIPTION DRUGS that are available in Scotland. We are ALL supposed to be 'British' arn't we?,Mr Prime Minister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
